text: Mateusz Kowalczyk (; born 3 May 1987) is a Polish tennis player who specialises in doubles. ==Career== He reached his highest doubles ranking of world no. 77 on September 9, 2013. He has played with Tomasz Bednarek, Błażej Koniusz, Marcin Gawron, and Artem Sitak. ==ATP career finals== ===Doubles: 3 (1 title, 2 runner-ups)=== {| |- valign="top" | {|class="wikitable" !Legend |-
